title: User Registration with Email and Role Selection
description: Verify that a new user can register with a valid email, password, and select either teacher or student role successfully.

steps.description: Navigate to the registration page
Input valid name, email, password, confirm password
Select role as teacher
Submit registration form
Verify registration success and redirection to login or dashboard
Repeat registration with role selected as student
Verify registration success and role is saved as student

title: User Registration Validation and Error Handling
description: Verify that form validations trigger and display appropriate error messages on invalid registration inputs including missing fields, invalid email, weak password, password mismatch.

steps.description: Navigate to registration page
Submit empty registration form
Verify errors shown for required fields
Input invalid email format
Verify invalid email error displayed
Input password and confirmation that do not match
Verify password mismatch error displayed
Input weak password below minimum strength
Verify weak password error displayed

title: User Login with Email/Password
description: Verify that a registered user can log in successfully using correct email and password credentials with persistent JWT session.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Enter valid registered email and password
Click login button
Verify successful login and redirection to correct role-based dashboard
Verify JWT token is issued and stored for persistent session

title: User Login Failure with Incorrect Credentials
description: Verify that login fails with appropriate error messages for wrong email or password inputs.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Enter unregistered email and any password
Click login button
Verify login failure message for invalid email
Enter registered email and incorrect password
Click login button
Verify login failure message for incorrect password

title: Google OAuth Registration and Login
description: Verify users can register and login successfully using Google OAuth with correct role assignment and session persistence.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Click on Google sign-in button
Authenticate and authorize via Google
Verify user is registered or logged in successfully with proper role
Verify JWT token is issued and session is persistent

title: Teacher Gig Creation with Valid Data
description: Verify that authenticated teacher can create a new teaching gig with all valid fields successfully.

steps.description: Login as teacher
Navigate to create gig page
Input valid title, category, price, duration, description, availability
Submit gig creation form
Verify gig is created and appears in teacher dashboard and in gig browsing for students

title: Teacher Gig Creation Validation and Error Handling
description: Verify validations prevent gig creation with missing or invalid inputs and appropriate error messages are shown.

steps.description: Login as teacher
Navigate to create gig page
Submit gig form with empty required fields
Verify validation errors are displayed for required fields
Input negative price or duration
Verify validation errors for invalid numeric values

title: Teacher Gig Update and Deletion Authorization
description: Verify only authenticated teacher owner of the gig can update or delete their gig; others are denied access.

steps.description: Login as Teacher A
Create a gig
Login as Teacher B
Attempt to update Teacher A's gig
Verify access denied or forbidden error
Attempt to delete Teacher A's gig
Verify access denied or forbidden error
Login back as Teacher A and update or delete gig
Verify operation success

title: Student Browsing and Filtering Gigs
description: Verify student can browse available gigs and apply filters by category, price range, and rating.

steps.description: Login as student
Navigate to gig browsing page
Verify list of gigs is displayed
Apply filter by category
Verify gigs displayed match selected category
Apply filter by price range
Verify gigs displayed match selected price range
Apply filter by rating
Verify gigs displayed meet or exceed rating filter

title: Student Booking Request Creation with Valid Schedule
description: Verify student can create booking requests for selected gigs with valid preferred scheduling data successfully.

steps.description: Login as student
Browse and select a gig
Input valid preferred date and time
Submit booking request
Verify booking request is created with status pending and appears in student and teacher dashboards

title: Booking Request Validation and Error Handling
description: Verify booking fails with invalid scheduling data and appropriate error messages are displayed to student.

steps.description: Login as student
Select a gig to book
Input past date or invalid time format
Submit booking request
Verify form validation errors are displayed for scheduling fields

title: Teacher Booking Approval and Rejection Workflow
description: Verify teacher receives booking requests and can accept or reject them. Status updates propagate correctly to student and teacher dashboards.

steps.description: Student creates a booking request for Teacher's gig
Login as teacher
Navigate to booking requests dashboard
Verify pending booking request is visible
Accept the booking request
Verify booking status updates to accepted for both student and teacher
Reject a different pending booking request
Verify booking status updates to rejected correctly

title: Payment Processing after Booking Acceptance
description: Verify that upon booking acceptance, student can proceed with secure payment and payment success updates booking status correctly.

steps.description: Student creates booking request and teacher accepts it
Student is prompted to pay for the booking
Complete payment via integrated secure gateway
Verify payment success message displayed
Verify booking status reflects payment completion

title: Dashboard Data Accuracy for Teacher
description: Verify teacher dashboard accurately displays earnings, ratings, booking requests and their statuses.

steps.description: Login as teacher
Verify displayed earnings match completed sessions
Verify ratings are correctly aggregated and displayed
Verify all booking requests are listed with correct status

title: Dashboard Data Accuracy for Student
description: Verify student dashboard correctly shows upcoming classes, booking history, and statistics.

steps.description: Login as student
Verify upcoming sessions are listed with correct details
Verify booking history includes completed and cancelled sessions
Verify statistics data is correct

title: Real-time Updates for Booking Status Changes and Notifications
description: Verify real-time synchronization of booking requests, status updates, and notifications via email and in-app for both users.

steps.description: Student creates booking request
Teacher receives real-time notification in-app and email
Teacher accepts booking
Student receives real-time update and notification
Verify real-time data sync on multiple devices logged in as same user

title: Role-based Access Control Enforcement on API Endpoints
description: Verify that API endpoints enforce role-based access restrictions properly, returning forbidden or unauthorized errors when violated.

steps.description: Attempt to create gig using student JWT token
Verify 403 Forbidden error returned
Attempt to update booking status using student token
Verify 403 Forbidden error returned
Access secured endpoints without authentication
Verify 401 Unauthorized error returned

title: Form Validation Across Frontend and Backend
description: Verify all forms enforce validation rules both client and server side to prevent invalid data submission.

steps.description: Submit registration form with invalid data
Verify client-side validation triggers and user cannot submit
Bypass client validation using API call with invalid data
Verify backend rejects invalid input with descriptive errors

title: Responsive UI Verification Across Devices
description: Verify that the UI renders correctly and is fully functional on various devices including desktop, tablet, and mobile with responsive design.

steps.description: Open application on desktop browser
Verify UI elements are correctly sized and laid out
Open application on tablet-sized viewport
Verify UI adjusts layout appropriately
Open application on mobile viewport
Verify mobile-first UI is fully accessible and functional

title: Loading and Error States Handling
description: Verify loading indicators appear during async operations and error states display appropriate feedback messages to users.

steps.description: Trigger page or data loading that takes time
Verify loading spinner or skeleton is visible
Simulate server error during data fetch
Verify user-friendly error message is displayed
